verses.verse: And the king <WH4428> Ahasuerus <WH325> laid <WH7760> a tribute <WH4522> upon the land <WH776>, and upon the isles <WH339> of the sea <WH3220>.

And all the acts <WH4639> of his power <WH8633> and of his might <WH1369>, and the declaration <WH6575> of the greatness <WH1420> of Mordecai <WH4782>, whereunto the king <WH4428> advanced <WH1431> him, are they not written <WH3789> in the book <WH5612> of the chronicles <WH1697> <WH3117> of the kings <WH4428> of Media <WH4074> and Persia <WH6539>?

For Mordecai <WH4782> the Jew <WH3064> was next <WH4932> unto king <WH4428> Ahasuerus <WH325>, and great <WH1419> among the Jews <WH3064>, and accepted <WH7521> of the multitude <WH7230> of his brethren <WH251>, seeking <WH1875> the wealth <WH2896> of his people <WH5971>, and speaking <WH1696> peace <WH7965> to all his seed <WH2233>.
